CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 30, 1957, pg. A19, reads: "PENGUIN BAR AND GRILL - The Penguin Bar and Grill, 512 Court Place, downtown, is open with delicious food and moderately priced liquid refreshments... Right photo shows a view of the beautiful bar and a group of satisfied customers. The Penguin features a variety of excellent sandwiches and the best in mixed drinks. - Harris Photos. - Advt."
TitMainTitle: Penguin Bar and Grill with men at bar and advertisements for Calvert, 512 Court Place, Downtown
